channel.title: Auto Detect paths for .bat
channel.description: Ok ive noticed some servers don't need people to change their paths when they start their client like near reality. Do they got a .bat file that auto detects the path that they need to run the client? if they do how can i get it?

item.title: Auto Detect paths for .bat
item.dc:creator: @Ty13r Ty13r
item.description:
@Ty13r wrote:

Could you expland on what you mean because the .bat files arn’t ‘auto detected’ all the locations are defined in the client some where, like project insanity has the cache’s location defined in the signlink.java and the location of the raw file is defined in the client.java (within the preload method)

Read full topic
